title: HIV Vaccine Candidate Triggers Neutralising Antibodies
desc: A novel HIV vaccine candidate induces neutralising antibodies after a single dose in primates, potentially accelerating HIV prevention.

title: soil health, youth and climate
desc: At the Africa Food Systems Forum 2025 in Dakar, leaders, scientists and youth highlighted soil health, climate resilience and food sovereignty as foundations for transforming Africa’s food systems.

title: Amazing support for pet vaccination drive in Pumula
desc: The LSC SPCA appeals to the public for support, to enable it to continue providing vital services to animals in need in the community. Anyone able to assist is encouraged to contact them on 039 3120962.

title: William and Catherine 'deeply concerned' over Jeffrey Epstein revelations
desc: It comes after documents released in the US shone new light on the scandal, including over Epstein's ties with Andrew.

title: Lobola cattle lost as FMD outbreak destroys livelihoods in Mpophomeni
desc: The FMD outbreak near Mpophomeni cost eMashingeni resident Mxolisi Zuma three cattle meant for lobola, setting his future plans back.
source: The Witness | Your compass in the community

title: Stranded in India for 13 years, Ugandan mother finally
desc: When Namuddu left Uganda in 2013, she travelled alone, filled with dreams of building a better life in India and returning home transformed. However, her plans did not materialise as expected. She struggled to secure stable employment, her visa eventually expired, and she had little to show for her efforts.
